params._base: When being used for a data type this is the extended object              otherwise this is the string that will be used for              extracting the sub string from
params._length: The length of the sub string to be extracted from the base

params._base: When being used for a data type this is the extended object              otherwise this is the string that will be used for              extracting the sub string from
params._length: The length of the sub string to be extracted from the base
params._offset: The starting point to extract the sub string from

substring(string,int256).notice: Sub String Extracts the beginning part of a string based on the desired length

substring(string,int256,int256).notice: Sub String Extracts the part of a string based on the desired length and offset. The offset and length must not exceed the lenth of the base string.
